mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT X.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT FILE_TRGT_KEY , CO_CD , TMPLAT_DIV /* 템플릿구분(발주,매입확정등) */ , (SELECT FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.TMPLAT_DIV) FROM DUAL) AS TMPLAT_DIV_NM , APP_NO /* 결재선구분 */ , APP_CMPLET_YN /* 결재완료여부 */ , MSSAGE_DESC /* 알림톡메시지 상세 */ , USE_YN /* 사용여부 */ , CREAT_ID , CREAT_PGM , NVL(TO_CHAR(UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS CREAT_DTTM FROM TB_BM17M01 A WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY CO_CD DESC, TMPLAT_DIV DESC, APP_NO DESC, CREAT_DTTM DESC, UDT_DTTM DESC ) X ) WHERE 1=1 AND RN BETWEEN ${firstIndex} AND ${lastIndex}

SELECT NVL(MAX_APP_NO, #{userId}||'-01') AS MAX_APP_NO FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DECODE(INSTR(APP_NO, #{userId}||'-'), 0, #{userId}||'-01' , #{userId}||'-'||LPAD( MAX( TO_NUMBER(SUBSTRING( APP_NO, -2)) ) OVER()+1, 2, '0') ) AS MAX_APP_NO FROM TB_BM17M01 WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL SELECT NULL AS MAX_APP_NO FROM DUAL ) WHERE MAX_APP_NO IS NOT NULL OR ROWNUM = 1

SELECT NVL(MAX(FILE_TRGT_KEY)+1, 1) AS MAX_FILE_TRGT_KEY FROM TB_BM17M01 WHERE 1=1
AND APP_NO = #{maxAppNo}

SELECT FILE_TRGT_KEY , CO_CD , TMPLAT_DIV /* 템플릿구분(발주,매입확정등) */ , (SELECT FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.TMPLAT_DIV) FROM DUAL) AS TMPLAT_DIV_NM , APP_NO /* 결재선구분 */ , APP_CMPLET_YN /* 결재완료여부 */ , MSSAGE_DESC /* 알림톡메시지 상세 */ , USE_YN /* 사용여부 */ , CREAT_ID , CREAT_PGM , NVL(TO_CHAR(UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS CREAT_DTTM FROM TB_BM17M01 A WHERE 1=1 AND FILE_TRGT_KEY = ${fileTrgtKey}
